```{r}
tracts <- st_read("CES4_Final_Shapefile.shp")
```

```{r}
th=theme_bw(base_size=10)+theme(strip.background= element_rect(fill="white"))
tracts_plot<-ggplot(data=tracts)+ geom_sf(data=tracts, inherit.aes = FALSE, col="#6f94e2") + th
tracts_plot
```
